DOC.brief_title: Effect Video-Module Based Mindfulness Training Physician Stress Well Being
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate impact video-module base mindfulness pilot program stress , well-being , mindfulness skill physicians community hospital setting . We administer eight-week mindfulness training October/November 2013 , offer part wellness initiative medical staff suburban community hospital Puyallup , Washington . Participants enrol first-come , first-serve basis , engage three 90-minute person training , weekly online video-module training , weekly teleconference coaching call . Video-module training available time , access participant ' convenience . Journals guide meditation audio library also provide . Physician stress , well-being ( emotional exhaustion , depersonalization patient , sense personal accomplishment ) , mindfulness skill ( observe , describe , act awareness , accept without judgment ) evaluate baseline , end-of-program , eight week post-intervention use well-validated instrument . Risks participant minimal , include possibility strong emotional response personal work undertaken participant course study . The project fund MultiCare Health System .
DOC.criteria: GSH medical staff member Other MultiCare employee
